why.title: Material science, system design and precise execution
why.description: Every ProGuard solution is the result of laboratory research, bespoke formulation and large-scale project experience – reducing risk and keeping performance predictable.

research.title: Research-driven formulas

systems.title: System architecture

certified.title: Certified quality

preparation.question: How should the surface be prepared before applying ProGuard systems?
preparation.answer: Surfaces must be free from grease, dust and weak layers. Our technical team specifies shot-blasting, washing or primers depending on the substrate.

warranty.question: How do you provide performance warranties?
warranty.answer: Once installation is verified against our method statement, we issue a warranty certificate and schedule periodic inspections.

thermal.question: Can thermal and acoustic insulation be applied together?
thermal.answer: ThermoGuard & SoundGuard delivers both; the closed-cell foam reduces thermal conductivity and blocks up to 18 dB of airborne sound.

support.question: What post-installation support is available?
support.answer: We offer routine site visits, layer thickness testing and troubleshooting assistance throughout the service life.

contact.description: Share your challenge and our specialists will respond quickly with tailored recommendations.

form.name: Full name
form.success: Thank you. Our team will contact you shortly.

section.title: Intelligent protection for every climate
section.description: Each ProGuard solution is engineered through rigorous testing to outperform in moisture, fire, corrosion and abrasion challenges.

ultraguard.title: UltraGuard
ultraguard.desc: A flexible, high-adhesion membrane that bridges hairline cracks and locks out moisture for years to come.

bloguard.title: BloGuard
bloguard.desc: Active crystals penetrate concrete capillaries to form a permanent barrier against water ingress.

smartguard.title: SmartGuard
smartguard.desc: A two-component system that withstands up to 12 bar of positive or negative pressure while remaining flexible.

fastguard.title: FastGuard
fastguard.desc: Stops active leaks in under 60 seconds so repair work can continue without interruption.

richguard.title: RichGuard
richguard.desc: A highly elastic topcoat that bridges thermal cracks and resists UV degradation.

nanoguard.title: NanoGuard
nanoguard.desc: A transparent hydrophobic treatment with a 92° contact angle to repel dirt and pollutants.

thermosound.title: ThermoGuard & SoundGuard
thermosound.desc: Closed-cell spray polyurethane that delivers superior insulation and sound attenuation in a single pass.

floguard.title: FloGuard
floguard.desc: A durable finishing layer engineered for heavy-duty industrial floors and chemical exposure.

armyguard.title: ArmyGuard
armyguard.desc: Fast-curing dual-component protection for impact-prone vehicles, tanks and equipment.

indax.title: Indax
indax.desc: Superior adhesion on concrete and steel, ready for the next layer within two hours.

flexcoat.title: FlexCoat
flexcoat.desc: A resilient floor system with high temperature resistance and exceptional elongation.

grotex.title: Grotex
grotex.desc: Delivers 4.1 MPa adhesion as a robust base for resin and elastomeric toppings.

metalguard.title: MetalGuard
metalguard.desc: Transforms oxidation into a stable layer and prepares steel for long-lasting coatings.

fireguard.title: FireGuard
fireguard.desc: Provides up to 120 minutes of fire resistance with low-VOC formulation for steel structures.

luminex.title: Luminex
luminex.desc: Stores light energy and glows for hours while withstanding rain and heavy traffic.

hero.notFoundDescription: Please visit the solutions page to browse additional products.

ultraguard.overview: UltraGuard is a single-component acrylic membrane that forms a seamless, flexible barrier on concrete and mineral substrates.
ultraguard.performance: The cured layer remains UV stable and crack-free across extreme temperatures.
features: Excellent adhesion to concrete, stone and plaster

bloguard.overview: BloGuard is a crystalline waterproofing slurry that penetrates the concrete matrix to block capillaries.
bloguard.performance: Reactive crystals rehydrate to seal micro-cracks and withstand hydrostatic pressure.
features: Suitable for new and existing concrete

smartguard.overview: SmartGuard combines a cementitious base with acrylic modifiers to create a flexible, pressure-resistant barrier.
smartguard.performance: Withstands up to 12 bar of hydrostatic pressure while tolerating thermal movement.
features: Can be applied to damp surfaces

fastguard.overview: FastGuard is a fast-setting hydraulic mortar designed to stop active leaks instantly.
fastguard.performance: Cures in under one minute and performs even in cold or wet conditions.
features: Can be applied against flowing water

richguard.overview: RichGuard is a high-build acrylic coating delivering a smooth, UV-resistant finish.
richguard.performance: Provides 400% elongation, bridging thermal cracks without loss of adhesion.

nanoguard.overview: NanoGuard is a transparent nano primer that repels contaminants through a high contact angle.
nanoguard.performance: Dries within 15 minutes and keeps surfaces clean without altering appearance.

thermosound.overview: ThermoGuard & SoundGuard is a closed-cell spray foam delivering high thermal and acoustic insulation in one application.
thermosound.performance: Offers a thermal conductivity of 0.021 W/m·K and reduces airborne sound by 18 dB.
features: Adheres to concrete, metal and timber

floguard.overview: FloGuard is a chemically resistant, hard-wearing topcoat for industrial floors.
floguard.performance: Provides high compressive strength and withstands aggressive acidic or alkaline environments.

armyguard.overview: ArmyGuard is a hybrid polyurea spray lining engineered for extreme impact and abrasion.
armyguard.performance: Cures quickly to a seamless shell that safeguards valuable assets in harsh duty.
features: Superior adhesion to steel and concrete

indax.overview: Indax is a two-component elastomeric primer that ensures maximum adhesion before high-performance topcoats.
indax.performance: Ready for recoating after two hours and completely solvent-free for safer application.

flexcoat.overview: FlexCoat is a three-component elastomeric flooring system delivering durability and flexibility.
flexcoat.performance: Maintains elasticity up to 280% and withstands temperatures up to 120°C.

grotex.overview: Grotex is an epoxy-elastomer primer that creates a highly adhesive base for resin toppings.
grotex.performance: Ready for the next coat after eight hours while preventing pinholes and bubbles.

metalguard.overview: MetalGuard converts rust into a stable layer and primes steel for long-term protection.
metalguard.performance: Fast reaction and dual-layer protection minimise future corrosion.
features: Transforms rust into a protective barrier

fireguard.overview: FireGuard is a water-based intumescent coating that expands to protect steel during fire.
fireguard.performance: Certified to EN 13381 delivering up to 120 minutes fire rating.

luminex.overview: Luminex is a photoluminescent traffic coating that stores light energy and emits it in the dark.
luminex.performance: Rain and heavy traffic resistant for long-lasting safety guidance.

footer.cta: Connect with us for a tailored consultation and transform your project.
